checkIn

public String checkIn(String chosenPatient,
                      String doctor,
                      WorldController wc)
               throws NoPersonWithNameAndRoleException,
                      ArgumentIsNullException,
                      ArgumentConstraintException,
                      SchedulingException,
                      PatientIsCheckedInException,
                      NotLoggedInException
Checks in a patient and schedules an appoint for this patient with a doctor

Parameters:
chosenPatient - the name of the Patient to check in
doctor - the name of the Doctor for the appointment
wc - the world in which this all happens
Returns:
a description of the made appointment
Throws:
NoPersonWithNameAndRoleException - the doctor and/or patient could not be found in the world
ArgumentIsNullException - the given world was null
ArgumentConstraintException - somehow the arguments given to the scheduler were null
SchedulingException - some the scheduler failed to schedule an appointment
PatientIsCheckedInException - the patient was already checked in
NotLoggedInException - the nurse is not logged in
